name: Timeline
description: The Timeline component shows events in chronological order and gives a great overview of the overall process.

props.name: subtitle
props.doc: Subtitle of the Timeline item, displayed below the `title`. Also supports passing an array of subtitles. The subtitle is usually a date of the timeline item.

props.name: infoMessage
props.doc: Info message, displayed in a [FormStatus of state info](/uilib/components/form-status#displaying-info-status), below the `subtitle` if it exists.

props.name: icon
props.doc: Override icon displaying on the left side (Not recommended). Default: `check` for state `completed`, `pin` for state `current`, and `calendar` for state `upcoming`.

props.name: iconAlt
props.doc: Alt label describing the icon provided.

props.name: skeleton
props.doc: If set to `true`, an overlaying skeleton with animation will be shown.

props.name: data
props.doc: List of [timeline items](/uilib/components/timeline/properties#timelineitem-properties) to render. Each object in data can include all properties from [Timeline.Item properties](/uilib/components/timeline/properties#timelineitem-properties).

props.name: children
props.doc: Content of the component. Can be used instead of property `data`, by adding [Timeline Item](/uilib/components/timeline/properties#timelineitem-properties) as children `<Timeline.Item {...props} />`.
